What I’m doing now

Right now I’m

  • looking for a new contract to start in February or March 2024 (check out my portfolio)
  • reading The Goods of Design by Ariel Guersenzvaig, Acceptance by Jeff VanderMeer and Company of One by Paul Jarvis
  • preparing for my practical driving test
  • migrating this website to a new design

Later I’d like to

  • pick up where I left off learning Welsh
  • walk the Llŷn Peninsula section of the Wales Coast Path
  • finish walking the South Downs Way
  • take and pass my driving test

If I finish the projects in the top list, I’ll have time to take on projects in the bottom list. That, I’m told, is the point of a now page.
